website_summaries.verdict: An adaptable sound machine with technically advanced versatility make this a top choice.
pros: Off the charts in terms of quality and featues
Constantly monitors ambient noise levels and automatically adjusts itself to the environment
cons: On the higher end of the pricing spectrum
An early product from Adaptive Sound Technologies

customer_reviews.title: Audio starts ok and then gets awful!
customer_reviews.text: Had the same problem as many of the other negative reviews - sound goes bad after a few months. We were using this every night and liked the variation, but after having the sound on a particular sound for a few weeks the audio starts to get really bad, and I would wake up and hear scratching and popping, and it's not subtle. It got to the point where the bad audio would wake me up and drive me crazy til I turned it off.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: It WILL cut out. It does a strange noise, and shuts off.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, when it was working. I bought this on May 30, 2020, through Amazon. Today is August 15, 2020. It has worked flawlessly, until now. It works, and works, and within about 5 minutes, it does a hiccup sound, like grinding bad breaks (without the high pitch of metal on metal) and it shuts off. Very disappointed. NO other sound machine sold on Amazon matches the beautiful sounds this made when it worked correctly. I am frustrated. I NEED a sound machine. I have tired MANY others. I feel so lost... I want a "working correctly" sound machine.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Scott

customer_reviews.title: Best one I've used
customer_reviews.text: 2 years after purchase and it's still going strong. No loop pattern or break in the sounds ever. All the buttons are still functional. The sound is still clear and loud. It's a very well built, well thought out sound machine. Highly recommended. Update: another year down and it is still going strong. We are thinking about buying another for our upcoming baby. It doesn't exactly look like it belongs in a nursery, but it's durability and longevity can't be denied. It is still loud and working as intended. No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Sanity Saver
customer_reviews.text: We moved to a busy country road and are in the midst of roosters crowing at 4 am, huge semi trucks barreling down the road, and sad cows mooing all hours of the night. I love this thing so much , it’s totally worth the expense. It has saved my sleep! The most awesome feature is the adaptive button, wherein the sound machine gets louder when it senses noise . You will not regret this purchase, it is the bees knees and has so many different sounds to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Parker's Mom

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have trouble sleeping and bought this to try and help me fall, and stay, asleep. It was wayyyy more expensive than the others out there, but I decided it was worth it to splurge. It works great! My husband (snorer!) is pretty much drown out by this thing and that's saying something. I will say that when I bought it, the item was out of it's plastic, and so that tells me it wasn't brand new. I was irritated about that, but couldn't be bothered sending it back and figured I would see if it worked (it did). So, no harm, no foul, I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  Got two.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it a month and love it. Has 10 sounds with 3 levels of detail for each. It has a timer with 4 settings and you can shut off the display lights. Very tactile controls that you can operate in the dark. Pretty sleek looking. I keep it on a lot, sleep with it on all night, and bought a second one for the other room. You can match the various sounds to what you like, and to what might be disturbing you. It works for me. Less annoyed in the apartment and sleep better. I’d say, get one....
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Helps me sleep at night
customer_reviews.text: I have problems sleeping due to some health issues and I was reccomended to get a noise/sound machine. At first I thought the loud noise would keep me up, and I previously bought a smaller, cheaper, one and I was not pleased. The smaller one sounded crappy and tinny so I went searching for a better one. I researched this machine and went for it. It is leagues better than cheap ones out there. I can't tell if there's a skip in the audio track and the auto adjust volume is very nice. I am happy I can sleep better with this product. Please try this one out, even if it is more expensive than most.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Sound+Sleep High Fidelity Sleep Machine
customer_reviews.text: I have tinitus plus, my wife and I live in a "noisy" neighborhood. The sound machine that we had for 2 or 3 years finally stopped working. Although none of the new units I looked at had outstanding reviews this unit had some of the best. Have had it for several months now. Use it nightly. I really like being able to try the different sound fields that are available. Different ones work better with the different sources of noise. Although the adaptive sound system works well, I've found that adjusting it myself works best for me. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a good sound generator to help drown out annoying noises (including tinitus).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Started out great--but after three weeks...
customer_reviews.text: Again, it started out amazing--the sound quality is excellent (better than any other unit I'd used previously), the sound options are great, it's sleek and looks good on my nightstand... but then the crackling noises started. It seems that after a while, the unit can wear out after use. I keep mine on all night and noticed a loud clicking sound after about three weeks of operation. If it hadn't have been for this issue, I'd have rated it five star, but it really detracts from the experience hearing a continual clicking when you're trying to sleep. Hopefully they will fix it for me and I will udpate this review once I speak to customer service about the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Greene N

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Sleeps Better
customer_reviews.text: We use this sound machine for our baby, whose bassinet is in our bedroom. It's great because the adaptability feature keeps us from waking her up as we move around. We do keep the machine pretty loud- but found it drowns out noises better when turned up some. It even stops the dog from barking at the neighbors' car doors. A must have for extra sleep with a newborn!
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: This sleep machine WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I like the different sound choices and the way you can adapt the sound to fit quiet or noisier surroundings. Of course, there is the volume control as well, but the adaptive and richness controls allow more variance in the sound. I have not used the timer, because I leave the machine all night long. I am sleeping much better! I know others have purchased less expensive units, but I truly wanted a better sound, and I feel I succeed! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria G.

customer_reviews.title: If you have static on channels, call Jack!
customer_reviews.text: Wait! Don't throw your's away if it makes a static sound after about a week after purchasing it. I've purchsed four of these for my family. After about a week or two two of them are experiencing static on all channels. If that happens, call Jack at Sound Technologies weekdays from 9 AM to 5 PM Pacific Timezone at 408-377-3411. He's a super nice guy and will send you a new sound card. It takes about 5 minutes to install, and fixes this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Chevy

customer_reviews.title: It works wonderfully, until it shuts off randomly
customer_reviews.text: You may wonder why there are five stars for everything but overall product— well this is a fantastic machine for sound quality, how loud it can be and variety, but it shuts off randomly throughout night. It’s not set to a timer and yet will shut off randomly waking my baby along with this jarring change in environment. It’s incredibly frustrating bc it works so well, until it doesn’t. Wish I could love it— maybe I got a faulty one? Hit the helpful button If this helped you!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Claus

customer_reviews.title: This thing is fantastic, it helps falling asleep and staying asleep when ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic, it helps falling asleep and staying asleep when you have a very busy mind or very noisy neighbors. The only thing that kinda sucks is that the micro sd cards seem to wear out overtime on whatever sound you use the most, usually with popping sounds and small distortions. Both times i had these issue adaptive sound promptly sent me a new card with easy instructions how to replace it, without any proof of purchase or defect. Great company that i hope stays around. On a side note i wish there was a way to stock up on the micro sd cards for near cost :)
customer_reviews.author: JonnyJ

customer_reviews.title: Highest quality, authentic sound. Way Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality, clarity and authenticity of the "Soundstories" is outstanding! Thank you audio engineers at ASTI, you've done great, groundbreaking work on this product... you left the competition in the dust. Your Low-Tech control knob is so easy to use. Very happy With this product. To get better sound quality, I set the unit on its side so the speaker faces me. It sounds even better- see photo. I'm returning it to get their Special Edition model which I've already received and is even more remarkable.
customer_reviews.author: RickWAllen

customer_reviews.title: ZZZZzzz
customer_reviews.text: I've suffered with sleep for years! It wasn't until a few years ago I discovered a phone app that would play different types of white noise, rain, train, etc. I loved it, but I hated using my phone. My mother-in-law got me a white noise machine for Christmas but it was really cheap and only lasted 6 months. I purchased this after reading several reviews and comparing prices and decided to go for it. I love it. It helps me sleep the same way, the noise quality is great, and the options are nice too.
customer_reviews.author: amowrey715

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like the real thing
customer_reviews.text: We have gone through a lot of different sound makers both for us and the kids. Many sound like everything is coming through a tin can. This unit produces a deep sound with realistic backgrounds that are not set to a tigh loop so you are hearing the same noise every 10 seconds. It is very easy to use and there a lot of customizations to add additional background noise depending on your preference. It has a sleek look so you dont mind having it our on a dresser and there are no annoying lights that stay on when the unit is working detracting from the darkness of the room.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Petz

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Serenity
customer_reviews.text: I read so many different reviews on white noise machines, and every source named this one as their top choice. I was very hesitant on spending so much money on a white noise machine, but then I figured that it was worth it, and boy was I right! There were so many setting I was able to find which one really worked for me, as well as adjust the amount of sound was in the background. It helps to cancel the noise from the upstairs neighbors as well as noise from outside. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle K.

customer_reviews.title: Realistic sound and attractive design.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a "sound generating device" after years of my spouse requiring it to fall asleep. We live in a quiet area, so it's more of a dependency than a requirement. This unit has far more realism and functionality. It actually programs me to sleep, something I never dreamed (pun intended) I would require. Sound fidelity is great for a small, portable unit. I likely won't travel with it, so its intended purpose is just to provide background ambiance at bedtime at home.
customer_reviews.author: Carl G. Kleinhenz

customer_reviews.title: Second Unit, Awesome support
customer_reviews.text: We've had our original unit for a while and just bought our son a unit for use at college. Coincidentally our original unit died just as we ordered this one...Asound support was great to work with and helped us out. No regrets on this purchase...you have to love a company that stands behind their products!
customer_reviews.author: jmb

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Device
customer_reviews.text: You would never know you need one of these machines until having one and you know you will not be able to live without it going forward. The reason I gave only 4 stars is that I use Alexa devices smart home devices to power equipment on and off in my house. When I turn off the Sound+Sleep machine off and back on again, I physically have to go back to the machine and turn the power button back on. It does not remember its last setting. this day in age all electronics need to be up to date with smart home devices as it is the wave of the future.
customer_reviews.author: Blas777

customer_reviews.title: THIS REALLY HELPS TO WALL OUT SHARP SOUNDS
customer_reviews.text: A very beautiful quality;quality of the sounds for the most part is incredible. Very soothing, very bright tones, even the soundsi in nature seem like they are right there. For example, the sound of rain. I had to convince myself that no I was not in a flood it was just recorded rainfall. I live in a building with uncarpeted halls, the hallways itself is like a sounding board overhead the same so it was very difficult sometimes. This dear angelic machine saved my quality not only of rest but helped me get more done at home in studies which are very important to me. Truly a divine invention.
customer_reviews.author: mary angela douglas

customer_reviews.title: 2 Junk units
customer_reviews.text: First unit would do nothing but flash lights. Went through all the troubleshooting steps in the manual. Sending unit back and requesting a replacement. So at this point I pretty much paid to make a run to the UPS store. Edit. Received 2nd unit. Sound Quality is terrible. Static with pretty much every setting. Static and brook. Static and Rainfall. Static and fireplace. Can hear no changes with richness setting or if it does change anything its barely perceptible. Did the reset and it changes nothing. I am happy for the people who this works for. However in my experience this is just a poor quality product and I would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Wildhunt

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sound Selections, but....
customer_reviews.text: Nice variety of sounds to choose from, but after having it for some time, a few of the sounds are no longer as distinctive as they were originally. Still, a lot of nice features: automatic turning off of the "on" light; easy volume control when the room is dark; timer to use if you wish; adaptive sound level which will allow the noise to increase or decrease, depending on the "environment noise" where you are sleeping; "richness" setting which you adjust to make the noise of for example rain to have thunder at a frequent or infrequent interval; headphone jack as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Slavin

customer_reviews.title: Soothing Sounds
customer_reviews.text: I've had this sound machine for about three weeks, and it's great. I haven't been using the timer because I prefer to have the constant sound in case I wake up in the middle of the night. The machine has been working as it should; no technical difficulties. The adaptive feature is nice to have, but I mostly use the machine at its most basic when I'm sleeping (no timer and no rich settings). What I like best about the machine is the choice of sounds and the design with the knob to select them. I also appreciate that the display lights can be completely turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Blissful Sleep
customer_reviews.text: Love this tech! Moved from 20 remote acres into a house bracketed by busy streets, and this adaptive Sound Sleep system let me sleep blissfully for the first time in months. No ear plugs! Its adaptive feature works wonderfully when jake brakes and glass mufflers increase the decibels. Yay! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Donoho aka J. M. Donoho & Jessie Jayne Smith

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Not worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: The sounds coming from this machine are not that much higher quality than the under $20 Homedics machine I got at Wal-Mart. The rain sounds pretty much the same as the stream setting, and the extra sound settings for each noise doesn’t add that much to the track. My machine has also started having wonky volume issues, with the rain or creek sound speeding up and getting twice as loud as set for 5-10 seconds before going back to normal. The machine is fine and cancels out other noise, but the cheap Homedics did the same thing. Don’t waste your money on this “higher-end” model. It’s not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: 1-4 Simple Pleasures

customer_reviews.title: Love this unit, but some of the features do not consistantly work
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine, but I'd love it a lot better if it worked consistently. There are three settings for sounds on each sound. Sometimes that setting doesn't work. Also, the lights go out on it here and there.
customer_reviews.author: John Hermanson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working: revise review
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these a few years ago but never used it much and it was placed on a shelf unused for a few years. Needed it the other night and it did not work when I plugged it in. The factory reset made some noise and then quit. It has no moving parts. What could break? I need to revised my review. Thinking I had nothing to lose, I sent an email to the manufacturer about my problem. They quickly responded that I probably needed a new memory card and just as quickly sent a new memory card with instructions. Replacing the memory card was easy and it is now working like new. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Rainfall has thunder grumble to it, meadow has meadow creatures in the background.
customer_reviews.text: The reason I dislike this machine is because the rainfall is actually more like a thunderstorm. I expected it to be just rain and I can hear a rumble of thunder off and on. The brook has what sounds like aquatic creatures, and the rest of the sounds are pretty much in that realm. The only sound that is a consistent drone of simple sound is the white noise and I have never been a fan of white noise. I miss my simple rain sound. Our last machine lasted 32 years, so need I say more? I am off to order other machines just to find what I am looking for..... I will keep this one as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: SuZckTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: covers my husbands snooring
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a good nights sleep. I normally listen to the ocean. It really helps cover up my husbands loud snoring. Wish I bought this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Cappie Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 Days
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this machine based on all the positive reviews. However I had a terrible experience with it. Worked fine for the first 2 nights, then STOPPED working!!! The light would flash on and off but no sound. I called the company and they promptly sent me a new one, and I returned the defective one. Company stated the machines have a memory card and one in a hundred will have this problem...Well 2 nights into the new one and we had the same problem. Obviously they have an issue they need to fix with this machine. I can really appreciate Amazons return policy as I have returned the second machine for a refund and will look for another machine..
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Glass

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this for sleep purposes - useful only if you wish to simply cover outside noise.
customer_reviews.text: If it were possible I would give this machine NO stars. This device inserts sudden random noises into its sleep scenarios: ocean setting includes bizarre seal noises, sudden and surprising sea gull cries; other settings include similar ‘additions’ to the sounds (bird calls, other animal sounds, and other random and unexpected loud noises) which make sleep impossible. Evidently, the developers of the machine did not realize that falling asleep requires regular and peaceful sounds, without the ‘exciting’ additionis inserted by the overly creative sound designers. Do not buy this machine if you wish to fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Carl W.

customer_reviews.title: Great features/ Great sounds
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this three days, but I'm very happy with the product. It as 10 settings with three levels each for a total of 30 settings. The white noise was a bit irritating, but I love the rain...drizzle, mild rain, and hard steady rain with rolling thunder in the background....which is what I've been playing the last three nights. It's incredibly calming. The buttons are placed well, the display lights can be turned off, and the sound is clear and crisp. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Talker

customer_reviews.title: A word of caution
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I hate writing a poor review. However, I purchased this product and it stopped working completely after 5 days. I ordered a replacement from Amazon which they shipped promptly. The replacement machine worked for 1 day. I would advise caution when purchasing this particular model as other reviewers seem to have had varying success. I will be looking at other companies for my sleep/sound needs.
customer_reviews.author: Morrigan

customer_reviews.title: Love / Hate
customer_reviews.text: I return the first two units I received. The machine simply stopped working after 3 to 5 weeks. The second replacement stopped after 3 weeks. Instead of returning the unit to Amazon, I contacted the manufacturer. They were aware of the problem: a bad memory card. (?!) They offered to either send me a new unit or send me a new memory card with instructions on how to install it. I choose the memory card option. The machine is now working again. Other than the above issues, I love the machine!
customer_reviews.author: Tony R. Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Works well, baby sleeps - UPDATE: stops working after a year
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: about a year after purchasing, suddenly the volume of the machine will now barely go above a whisper. Obviously not much use. Not built to last. —- We've been using this for about a year now, and it helps keep our little guy asleep through the night. We only use the white noise, though the fire sound, etc. might be nice to meditate to. This thing has become indespensible for our family and we take it whenever we travel. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This saves me!
customer_reviews.text: My husband snores and it had been rough getting a decent night's sleep. Now, when he repeatedly rolls to his back and snores again, I just push the button, and the sound machine both drowns out his noise, and tends to make him roll back over on his own! I have had 3 sound machines. This thing is the best! It's well worth the money. Have had it for 2 years and it works as well as the day I got it. Will buy more for our cottage.
customer_reviews.author: books

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra cost
customer_reviews.text: We bought this sound machine after being very disappointed in a cheaper model from another company. Controls make it very easy to operate. Excellent sound effects. We usually set it to 60 minutes each night and I haven't detected any looping. Nice selection of sound effects (although the Meditation sounds are a bit odd). Excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: bbsun

customer_reviews.title: Can’t hear the neighbor’s barking dogs all night!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in an attempt to sleep with a neighbors dog barking majority of the night... it took awhile to find the right volume level BUT since doing so I LITERALLY have not heard the dog since and it has DRASTICALLY improved my ability to sleep through the night without ear plugs. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Beckley

customer_reviews.title: Tinnitus who? Get this one already
customer_reviews.text: I used to have so much trouble falling asleep due to my tinnitus and several sites that I looked up recommended sound machines to mask the sound. Another dozen google searches later, and I wound up here. I've had my sound machine for half a year now and I love it. It works really well. I'm one of the people who aren't really into white noise, so mine is usually set to one of the more natural sounds, and it's really good - they don't sound like they come out of the machine, to put it that way. I'd probably get another one of these if my current one breaks (knock on wood). 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: This device worked great for about two months. Now it turns off randomly. And it doesn’t just turn off. It makes a loud sound like A radio tune to channel that you don’t get and the lights flash and then it shuts off. It keeps waking me up during the night. I really wanted to love it because the options are amazing. I’m really upset that I spent so much money and it’s past the return point. It didn’t last long enough to validate the cost
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Works great but no longevity
customer_reviews.text: I’d love to write a great review because the product does a great job....until it stops working, that is. We’re now on our second one and it didn’t last nearly as long as the first. The first time the white noise kept shifting to other noises for no reason. The second, well it just stops working after a few minutes and makes a crazy loud buzzing noise before it stops. Frankly, for $80 I should get a lot longer use than a few months on this product. Very frustrating given its quality when working. Spend less money on something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Liggitt

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I bought this particular one because the noises are “non-looping”. Sounds that are looping typically keep me awake so if you like looping sounds, I’d get something different. The “adaptive” setting is also really nice because it’ll automatically adjust to noises in the room (like snoring partners) and increase/decrease volume accordingly. It has multiple sounds as well and gets pretty loud.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product with superior customer support
customer_reviews.text: We use this machine every night. We travel with this machine. It works with excellent fidelity, does not repeat which, if you have used other machines, becomes very annoying. Customer service is friendly, swift and generous. Totally impressed with the company and product.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Best decision I've made this year!
customer_reviews.text: I can finally get some sleep at last. With my noisy neighbors upstairs and next door, along with the noise from the outside air conditioning units, this machine drowns out all the bothersome noises. Read up on many of these machines and they were either too expensive and/or too big!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Foody!

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this thing. Using the Adaptive feature, it covers up my husband's VERY loud snoring enough for me to sleep with headphones. This is a real victory. Just past the warranty period, it developed a clicking noise. I called the company. They admitted they had received some bad sound cards. They promptly sent out a replacement with superbly worded instructions. now it works like a charm again. While it wasn't working properly, I bought a cheaper, competitor sound machine. The difference was amazing - the Sound + Sleep is truly worth the extra money for the sound quality and adaptive feature. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to combat the annoyance of loud neighbors
customer_reviews.text: This machine has been used every single night since I bought it. Yes, I was hesitant because of the price, but I was desperate for something since we have god awful neighbors. Since I’ve bought this machine absolutely none of their activities shake me from my sleep. The best feature is that the machines’ sound adjust by how loud the room is. It also has an amazing variety of sounds to fit any preference! Would buy a thousand times over !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Machine...Helps Block Tinnitus
customer_reviews.text: I've had the same machine for several years and run it every night, all night. I also always have a back-up because I rely on the sound to help me sleep through tinnitus. I like most of the sounds but usually use "meadow" for the sound of the crickets. I keep the box it came in and that allows me to bring it when I travel. It might be higher in price then some of the others but for me it is well, well worth the price. It also does not bother my husband although it's stationed closer to me.
customer_reviews.author: MPaquette

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended for Tinnitus Sufferers
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I’ve owned. My first one gave out one day after multiple years of use. I like it so much I didn’t hesitate to order a replacement. It’s the only way I can sleep with my high pitched tinnitus. The brook setting is my personal favorite. The machine works perfectly and I love that you can turn off the lights when you’re ready to sleep. The adaptive sound is a nice feature, but I’ve rarely used it.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Company
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. I've tried several different ones and this one is by far the best and loudest. When I had a problem with the machine I contacted the company and they sent me a new one within days.
customer_reviews.author: WindeeMM

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: We loved the thunderstorm setting and used it every for several months. Then it started to shut off earlier and early in the night, until finally it would only play for 10 minutes. The other settings worked fine, but we didn't find them as easy to fall asleep too and figured the same thing would happen eventually. I just discovered that my "product service window" closed in July, but I bought the thing in January and thought it had a year's warranty. I'm disappointed and won't buy any of their products again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was definitely worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this! I was a little hesitant to pay $100 for it . But we needed something because we were getting new cats and I didn’t want them disturbing my neighbor. After a few weeks I don’t even realize it’s on it’s soothing calming and really makes a difference to blocking noise or conversations coming from a room. This was definitely worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Tbrown

customer_reviews.title: My 48 year old son is FINALLY getting a good night sleep.
customer_reviews.text: My son has had sleep issues from birth. He's 48 now and was quite ill last year and not sleeping much at all. I read the reviews on numerous "sleep machines" and purchased this for him. SO VERY GRATEFUL to have success with this item. Sleep means everything to a person with or without Insomnia. THANK YOU, THANK YOU. GOD SEND!!!
customer_reviews.author: ginny b

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can control the volume and that I ...
customer_reviews.text: The world's-lightest-sleeper approved! I love that I can control the volume and that I can make it *really* loud if I want to. My favorite is the white noise, but the meditation and rain are really nice too. This along with the dohm are my two favorite things to help me sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Best Sound Machine Out There
customer_reviews.text: This sound machine saved my life! I live in a very loud house, with thin walls. My room was directly next to the living room and my roommates were less-than quiet. This sound machine drowned out all sound and made my nights so much better. The best feature is the adaptive sound - meaning it will get louder if it detects more sound in order to drown it out. Can't recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: Macey

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Helps me sleep. I love the rain track. It has three levels for each sound, and useful for those who have tinnitus or just want a nice sound to help with sleep or relaxation. This is the best of this kind of machine I have ever heard.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Mooter

customer_reviews.title: Adjust your sound.
customer_reviews.text: This is one fine machine. It does take you a little to get the sounds adjusted for your personal preference. It can be too loud but you adjust it down. Last night my husband heard all the wind and rain so he got up to make sure trees won’t falling in the yard. It was pouring rain but no wind. It is one good machine.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: The unit has not stopped working properly after 4 months. It will all of a sudden make a horrible noise in the middle of the night after about 1 hour. My wife was loving this machine as it helps her sleep after working long hours in the ER. She is a PA. She is also now helping with the COVID-19 effort in the ER and this is impacting her sleep. Will be reaching out to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Woerner

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine! take it with me traveling too!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sound machine. I run it every night and I like that each sound can be more intricate if I choose. For example, on the ocean sound, if I want more than just ocean, I can push a button and now every once in a while I will hear a seagull in the background, push again and hear even more. There are so many varieties, it's great! It fits nicely on the nightstand and looks good too, very sleek. Plus, it's small and light enough to take when traveling. It's a must have in those totally quiet hotel rooms. And I don't have to drain the battery on my cell phone using apps. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: No more neighbor noise
customer_reviews.text: I like the muting of noises I create but, I love not hearing my annoying neighbors. The sound could be a lot clearer and more distinct but, it is doing what I bought it for. It is a noise making machine designed to bring a sense of calm and cancel out other noises. Would really like to hear the nature sounds more clearly but, it seems to have sound limitations.
customer_reviews.author: T Dorcey

customer_reviews.title: Reliable with Great Sound.  Expect big improvement with your sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I was just looking this product up to refer to a friend. I was surprised to see I ordered several all the way back in 2013. All are used every night and we have had no problem with sound issues others have reported. Sound quality is great and I get to sleep on average in two-three minutes.
customer_reviews.author: TigerZedOne

customer_reviews.title: The automatic volume feature
customer_reviews.text: This is going to sound contradictory, but you understand why I rated it five stars. First, we bought this for our newborn because the volume can change with crying. This was a one of a kind feature I found. It has worked brilliantly. We bought this is April. It's July. And it stopped working. So three months for a 80 dollar product. Here comes the earning of 5 stars. I called the company, explained what is happening... And there's one already in the mail coming my way. Absolutely fantastic customer support. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Clear, great volume control, lots of sound options
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Sounds are clear, loud enough for our large room and very versatile. The self-adjusting volume is great for those nights where we have lots of house guests. Use de to have a homemedic brand. Love the versatility of this one.
customer_reviews.author: KCH

customer_reviews.title: I will not be charged with murder thanks to my purchase
customer_reviews.text: If you have thoughts of killing your neighbors this product is for you. I installed numerous "soundproof" crap on my ceiling and walls and had to hire painter twice to finish walls at a cost of nearly $2K in total. The sound emitting through walls and ceiling was cut by 80 percent but I wasnt satisfied and I fiqured if I killed my neighbors it would cost more in legal fees then to try out this sound/sleep machine. Since receiving my product Im happy to report I no longer have thoughts of murder.
customer_reviews.author: Super Genius

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several sound machines that I ended up disappointed with. This one works for me! It takes me awhile to fall asleep since my mind wont shut up and let me sleep, so I set in on the longest play setting, and I have never heard it shut off on me yet which means, YAY, I am sleeping! My favorite sound is the ocean. Second would be the rain. Both work and the sound is awesome. I spent a little more for this one since past ones haven't helped much. So glad I did! Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Some good, some bad.
customer_reviews.text: Some good sounds, some bad sounds. The richness setting did not seem to work for some of the sounds. As far as the main sounds go, the ocean was great, but I bought this machine for the variety of sounds. A couple of the others were okay - the brook and the train, for example. In the meadow, I heard no difference from varying the richness of sound settings, and the crickets sounded unnatural. This one is not for me. I guess I have to listen to the sounds in a store before I buy a sound machine.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pruduct
customer_reviews.text: This sound machine is great ! I work the grave yard shift and have to sleep during the day. This machine has provided the sound of rain, or crackling fire during the winter months to lull me to a deep sleep. Yesterday my power went out and the power light on the machine started blinking rendering the unit non functional. I tried resetting it as instructed by others here to no avail. So, I called the company. The customer service is exactly as others have described it. They are sending me a memory card for me to replace. I can not wait to hear my bedside buddy again soon. Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who loves to hear the rain. I wanted a good product with good sound and this one is it! He wants another one for back up or to use elsewhere - travelling, etc. The other sounds are realistic and not tinny sounding. We are very happy with this choice.
customer_reviews.author: Julie G. Waddell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Sleeping Machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sleeping machine because I was working 12hr shift 6pm-6am as an CNA a few months ago. The sounds really put me to sleep. I like that you can plug earphones to the machine. This helped a lot. Also the adaptive mode is great it really works. The quality of the sounds are unbelievable. The fire place really make you think nice and cozy thoughts. All the nature sounds are great. If you like nature and nature sounds this machine is worth the money. It's first rate and very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: G Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Best White Noise Machine Ever
customer_reviews.text: The machine was purchased to improve sleep. The machine has 10 different sound options. Within each option there are additional options to add richness to the sound. There is a volume control. There is a continuous play and timer option. The machine can be set to requlate the volume with respect to background sound or the sound level can be set to a set volume. The sound seems natural and continuous without the feeling that it is repeating. Most importantly my sleep has improved measurably since using this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Ted H

customer_reviews.title: AND I RESEARCHED THESE SOUND MACHINES PRETTY HEAVY, WE LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: WE RECEIVED OUR SOUND MACHINE ABOUT 2 MONTHS AGO, AND I RESEARCHED THESE SOUND MACHINES PRETTY HEAVY, WE LOVE IT, I LIKE THE IDEA IT CAN STAY ON ALL NIGHT, INSTEAD OF JUST A FEW HOURS, WHICH IT CAN DO IT HAS A TIMER, BUT FOR MY NEEDS I WANTED IT ALL NIGHT. LOVE THE DIVERSITY OF ALL THE DIFFERENT SOUNDS, PLUS THE ADJUSTMENTS YOU CAN MAKE TO THE SOUND. FOR YOUR MONEY THIS IS THE BEST BUY. ALSO I THINK THE DIFFERENT SOUNDS, HAVE A GREAT QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: jeanette stefanoff

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after moving into a apartment close to the city. It’s been wonderful until it recently started making weird noises and turning itself off. Disappointing it did not last.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: It's the best.
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I expected and better. The sound quality is very good. As most of us are working from home, now I can pretend I am working at the beach. It is very calming and it does not distract a person from focusing on something elso. I am so glad that I bought it. I would recomend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: It works well, and blocks unwanted noise considerably, but I dropped it by mistake and although the lights on the front came on, it didn't work again. Would still recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Years of use and it’s still like new!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for quite a long time and just never reviewed it. I have sensory processing disorder (over-sensitive) . It’s perfect for me to block out sounds outside and in the house. It has saved me from totally freaking out many times. Years of use and it’s still working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Richards

customer_reviews.title: After five and one-half years...
customer_reviews.text: ...the machine stopped working. It was certainly out of warranty, of course, and I really thought I was going to have to buy a new one, but on the off chance there was an easy fix, I emailed the company. They got back to me right away and sent me a new sound card, with very detailed instructions on how to install it, and now the machine is like new again. Great machine, even better customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the thunderstorm feature and wound up totally disappointed. The thunder is so incredibly fakey (sp) I could not believe it. It sounds like someone beating on cookie sheets or similar. The more I listened to is, the more it aggravated me. I don't understand why someone just cannot record a thunderstorm and edit it to a chip
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Good value and effective.
customer_reviews.text: A good looking piece. Sounds quality is good but there is honestly little observable difference in some of the choices. And, some of the bird or other forest sounds are very digital sounding. But, it does work to give that background noise that some of us need to sleep effectively and at a decent enough price point.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Rail yard sounds
customer_reviews.text: It has rail yard sounds! I grew up around trains aka lower income and it is beyond soothing. Volume control is better than a lot of white noise machines but no were as good as a speaker. Timer and lights out feature are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: That thunderstorm tho...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using a free fan app on my phone and iPad for years now and I love it... then I saw this for sale and figured I’d give it a try. Definitely takes some getting used to but I’ve found I love the thunderstorm option. My only dislike is that the time only goes up to 120 minutes. When you live underneath a dancing elephant and your window is facing a busy road, it’d be nice to ensure my sleep by having it go up to 8 hours or so.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C Oetken

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine has kept me sain. My upstairs neighbors are loud. Really, really, really, really, really, really loud. Everytime they fight turn this little guy on and boom! No more screaming. TV base? Nope, gone. I use the white nose mostly but all the noises are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: ks bradley

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this 2 years ago and felt I needed to write.....
customer_reviews.text: This unit to me is very disappointing. I have only had this 2 yrs and after about a year and a half it started shutting off for no reason during the night. I do not have the timers set so it is not that. Also, with that said, when I turn it back on I have to a factory reset every time to get the secondary and background noises to start working again. Other than that I love the machine, and the reason I bought it was for the secondary background noises. But the unit failing after one year is not a great thing.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new sound machine. Great instructions. Up and running in about 5 minutes. Love the added noises...like thunder with the rain. Super fast delivery. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Toal

customer_reviews.title: loud neighbors?
customer_reviews.text: I have loud neighbors and thin walls. Not a good combo for someone who is a light sleeper. I started using this machine a few days ago and WTF. This machine reduced a lot of the unwanted noises from my loud neighboring units. I guess it would depend on how loud your neighbors are... but for me, this machine sort of muffles most the noise (so it doesn't cover it 100%). But it is enough to put me to sleep without earplugs. If you are stressed out about loud neighbors/lack of sleep at night- maybe give this machine a try. I am really glad I bought this machine...! Settings I use: white noise setting + 2 hr timer
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Two 'sounds' are dead already. But they fixed it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in Dec of 2012....and already two of the featured sounds will run for a few moments and then you also hear an electronic KZZZZZZT sound every once in a while. For the price, I would have hoped or this unit to last longer than a year. There are no moving parts to wear out, so why this has happened is beyond me. Later...I sent them an email and they explained that it was the sound card going bad...and sent me a new card (SD card..very tiny) and clear instructions to replace it. I did so, and no more problems! They also said to feel free to contact them for any other problems. EXCELLENT customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Pooky

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend going through tough times. She posted herself and cat on Facebook while listening to sounds of the Rain forest. Both enjoy it tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: W. Latham

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Sleep System Ever!
customer_reviews.text: The greatest investment I have ever made! I love this sleep system and can not express how wonderful it is and how it helps with sleep. The sounds fill and the room and keep me asleep and I wake more rested than ever. I highly recommend this sleep system.
customer_reviews.author: Mortisha

customer_reviews.title: Great soud  machine and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've used a few sound machine and this is by far the best. After using it for a few years, I noticed some static creeping into some of the play modes. I contacted Adaptive Sound Technologies via their website and received a new memory card within a week at no cost. I'm not very mechanical, but the instructions to replace the memory card were clear and concise, and the replacement took less than five minutes. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: pwb100

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product to help with our sleep. We have noisy neighbors, traffic and other noises to contend with. Now we sleep better. Love falling asleep to the "rain" setting.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a husband that snores and two dogs that bark at everything! When I turn this on to the thunderstorm, the dogs go to sleep and I don't hear a peep from them until morning! Other dogs are afraid of storms, mine think it's time for bed! It's great to drown out all the noises around you so you can sleep comfortably until morning without the disturbances around you. I've used mine for years now and would hate to be without it!!
customer_reviews.author: Roo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent white noise machine
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to help keep white noise going for a dog that is scared of thunder. I use it as part of trying to manage his high anxiety. It has numerous sounds to choose from as well as levels within each sound. It's loud enough and even will increase it's loudness when noise in the room elevates. This is perfect for my needs. It also would be great if I needed one for sleeping or for my office.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L

customer_reviews.title: Good unit but died way too fast for something with no moving parts.
customer_reviews.text: This unit works amazingly well and provided many nights of peaceful sleep... For the six months that it worked. For the last several days it will run for three or four minutes and then emit a horrible screeching sound at low frequencies and then shut off. There appears to be limited support with this as far as exchanging for another one. After chatting with Amazon I found it easier just to (begrudgingly) order another unit and hope it lasts a bit longer. Seems well built though, and was great when it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: After 6 months of good performance this sleep machine now makes loud buzzing noises ...
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of good performance this sleep machine now makes loud buzzing noises randomly. It sounds like an intermittent short. I really liked it until it stopped working. Good quality noise. The sound loops were not distinguishable. So the tracks are either really long or truly random.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Yeck

customer_reviews.title: One of the tracks broke in 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Hello! I really loved this sound machine until two nights ago when one of the tracks (rainfall) our favorite, made a huge mechanical noise and abruptly stopped. It will restart only to play and repeat. This is really rather distracting to me a night shift nurse who uses this to aid in sleeping during the day. I had highly recommended this machine to all my coworkers and it's extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is beyond awesome. My machine purchased 9/14 had a sound card ...
customer_reviews.text: Customer service is beyond awesome. My machine purchased 9/14 had a sound card go bad after about a year.... called customer service and received a new sound cardesign in a couple days. A year and a half later the sound card started giving issue again and instead of sending a new card I received a NEW machine in less than a week. I cannot sleep without my sound - it also allows peace to reign in my marriage as my husband makes talking sounds in his sleep and will often wake me .... this has been a wonderful experience with a fabulous company !!
customer_reviews.author: Tante Hannigan

customer_reviews.title: Nice... until it dies on you
customer_reviews.text: Mine lasted for a few years but then it stopped working. The speaker still seems to be fine, but the electronics that generate the noise have gone bad, if it had been inexpensive this wouldn't garner a negative review, but who ever heard of solid state components going bad so quickly? Basically, after a few seconds, it only emits a whining noise, and the display lights shut off. It hasn't been abused at all, it was just sitting on a desk. If they are going to charge so much for the thing, it would be nice if they'd put some of that money into the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: ocean) developed an annoying static crackle that impaired the intended effect. Fixed with replacement chip.
customer_reviews.text: My main criticism of this device is that after 2-3 months of use, several of the sounds (e.g. ocean) developed an annoying static crackle that impaired the intended effect. I subsequently received an e-mail from the manufacturer who stated the problem was due to a faulty chip. They sent me a replacement chip with detailed installation instructions. After installing the new chip the unit works fine so far. If you have similar problems, contact the company and they should send you a new chip.
customer_reviews.author: doctor jazz

customer_reviews.title: Best sound machine I’ve owned
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have slept with sound machines for 20 years and this one is the best I’ve ever used. The sound is so rich and clear. I am a huge fan of ocean waves and when I close my eyes I feel like I am right there napping on my favorite beach. I would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tpondaz

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Rich sound with surprising depth, both in terms of actual sound quality and interesting, irregular, non-repeating background noises. I wish some of the more interesting bird calls, etc. would persist for a bit longer when they do show up, but otherwise this sound machine is perfect. If far exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Hickory Hammer

product_meta.title: Sound+Sleep High Fidelity Sleep Sound Machine with Real Non-Looping Nature Sounds, Fan Sounds, White Noise, and Adaptive Sound Technology
product_meta.description:
SOUND+SLEEP Choose from 10 distinct sound profiles, each with three levels of richness to total 30 different sound profiles, all of which have been scientifically engineered to promote a deeper sleep, relaxation, and renewal. Unlike other “white noise” sound machines, SOUND+SLEEP uses magnificent, naturally recorded, high-definition sounds that are up to 30 minutes in length, eliminating all audio repetition for natural real-world sound environments.

AMAZON.COM
SOUND+SLEEP offers 30 distinct sound profiles scientifically engineered to promote a deeper sleep, relaxation and renewal. Unlike other “white noise” sound machines, SOUND+SLEEP uses magnificent, naturally recorded, high-definition sounds that are up to 30 minutes in length, eliminating all audio repetition for natural real-world sound environments.
feature_bullets: Buy with confidence from an American company
30 rich and immersive non-repeating sound environments for better sleep, relaxation, and sound masking
Adaptive Sound listens to your environment and responds instantly by adjusting audio volume. 3.5mm headphone jack
The optional sleep timer gently reduces the volume after 30, 60, 90, or 120 minutes to allow you to drift off to sleep
Front panel lighting automatically dims for distraction-free rest

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars4,243 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 30 Day Risk Free Guarantee, 1 year parts warranty
